General.Name: Sygnia Ltd
General.Description: Sygnia Limited provides investment management and administration services to institutional and retail clients in South Africa and the United Kingdom. The company offers multi-manager investment, specialist and balanced index-tracking, and umbrella retirement funds; and transition management, foreign exchange transacting, and stockbroking and securities lending services, as well as manages and administers custom-designed investment strategies. It also provides investment administration services, such as multi-tier unitization, compliance and regulatory reporting, optimized cashflow management and rebalancing, and performance analysis. In addition, the company offers liability administration and consulting, digital financial planning, and treasury services; and a range of savings products, including retirement annuities, living annuities, preservation funds, investment policies, and tax-free savings accounts. Sygnia Limited is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa.
General.Address: The Foundry, Cape Town, South Africa, 8001
